name: Sleipnir
movement: 40 feet walking speed and flying speed of 60 feet for one minute once per day
description: Sleipnir is a large, powerful creature resembling a horse, known for its remarkable strength and grace. It has rune-covered hooves and an impressive physique that enhances its combat abilities.
memorable: Known for its tactical Heroic Leap and ability to control the battlefield with its Trampling Charge and Gold and Ice abilities.
goals: To engage in combat effectively and protect its allies, leveraging its mobility and strength.
relations: Can be encountered alongside elemental beings due to its ability to communicate in Primordial.
environment: Often found in regions where it can utilize its physical strength and agility, potentially near icy terrains due to its cold resistance.
strengths: Exceptional physical prowess, dual capabilities in dealing bludgeoning and radiant damage, and ability to leap into advantageous positions in battle.
weaknesses: Slight weakness to cold spells, making it vulnerable to magical cold damage.
attacks: Multiattack with rune hooves causing bludgeoning and radiant damage, and a powerful charge that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Gold and Ice ability summons a devastating avalanche to control the battlefield and deal significant damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision that extends 120 feet and a passive perception of 15.
skills: Excels in athletics and has good perception, aiding in physical challenges and environmental awareness.
additional_information: Resistant to cold damage, taking half damage from cold attacks.
Immune to exhaustion, allowing sustained performance in prolonged encounters.
Ability to reposition effectively with Eight Hooves reaction.
test_queries: agile creature that uses avalanche attack
heroic leaping creature in icy terrains
monster with cold resistance and bludgeoning attacks
